Pivot a crosstable

Source: R/pivot.R
pivot_crosstable.Rd

Pivot a crosstable so the variable column is spread across its values.

Usage

pivot_crosstable(ct)

Arguments

ct

a crosstable

Value

a tibble of class pivoted_crosstable

Examples

ct = crosstable(mtcars2, c(mpg, drat, wt, qsec))
p_ct = pivot_crosstable(ct)
as_flextable(p_ct)
